home.title: Greetings.
home.desc: Welcome to my little 'room' of projects and ideas. I am a 3D Artist that likes to experiment with various objects and concepts.

intro.text: My skills mostly lie in creating various 3d models, organic and non-organic.
Also proficient in texturing, UV mapping and animations. Working on retopology and optimizing models for them to be ready for games is another expertise of mine.

arachna.name: Arachna
arachna.text: For Arahna the main idea was personal interpretation of the mythological race of half human half spider.

blocks.text: With the slight flight of fancy adding horns as a uniqueness of this particular representative of the race, implying some history with the demon race.
Absen of sleeves and tells somewhat of the climate, place the character resides in and person’s taste - fancy sleeve on one side of the arm.

chair.name: 'Chair'
chair.text: Original idea was to create photorealistic simple chair, but as most other projects it grew a bit into small research in node texture experimentation that is present in Blender software.

blocks.text: The chair and nearby objects should invoke certain comfiness and small desire to sit, relax and sip some of the tea.
Design wise it may confuse viewer as the design of table and chair varies, former is of feeling simple grandmotherly tea set, the latter of mid-tier level of design pompousness.

elfWarrior.name: Elf Warrior
elfWarrior.text: As the name implies original idea was to re-imagine Elves of fables to a more grounded notion, with the addition of race mixes, though taking into consideration supernatural and physical description of this race. The result is a character with a military officer glance.

blocks.text: Modifications towards agile nature of the Elves and credibility of movement with the armor were a priority.
Absen of sleeves and tells somewhat of the climate, place the character resides in and person’s taste - fancy sleeve on one side of the arm.
This character was optimized for game implementation. There is still room for lowering poly count.
More details and objects are in need to be added. Retopology, texturing and UV mapping except for rigging and animations are present in this model.

foolsIdol.name: Fools Idol
foolsIdol.text: This model is in a sense remake of 2009 Demon’s Souls Fool’s Idol. Was part of my Master Thesis project.

blocks.text: The main goal was to reimagine the boss of the game, trying to raise the level of detail and possibly incorporating more lore aspect into the model. Another point that was tried to be invoked is   sense of nastalgia.

Another point that was tried to be invoked is sense of nastalgia. Memories such as movements, visuals remind of those times, and in case of this a bit of rigidness as a puppet, no facial movement, 80% resemblance of attire. Magic invocation is also part of it.

heli.name: 'Heli'
heli.text: The main idea of the creation of this model was to imagine how advanced helicopters will be in a not distant future.

blocks.text: Though mostly project wasn’t finished, the base and parts of the model are optimized.

lowPoly.name: Low Poly
lowPoly.text: The plan for this project was to minimize polygon usage, and create low poly character in a small environment. Simple colors and simple shapes are main points of presentation, with implication of fantasy world theme.

blocks.text: Birds and the cat were small additions to liven the atmosphere. It should give a bit of feel of Lego world.
The character was rigged and face texture was added to give certain cuteness to it.

monster.name: Monster
monster.text: Main point of this model was to instill fear and some form of disgust without relying on Lovecraftian style of horror.

blocks.text: Imagining it in a room with a viewer expecting said reations. Another point of the work was to use as less

revolver.name: Revolver
revolver.text: The model is of revolver colt with some minor modifications. The design was mostly left intact as the main goal was to represent it in a standard fashion and research its intricacies.

blocks.text: Revolver is optimized in regards to polygon count, has UV map and textures which are not fully ‘backed’ (Blender has node system and permits live modifications on texture with render).

roomFurnishing.name: Room Furnishing
roomFurnishing.text: The idea for this project is to create relaxed room for a supposed family.

blocks.text: Some additional objects, details, unique items were added to give it homely and a bit personal feel. There is no lighting and textures as it is mostly also a training on optimization of a high detail room. The first phase of the project is finished.

tribalBeast.name: Tribal Beast
tribalBeast.text: The first idea was of a monster with the large hands accentuating its strength. Along its creation the feeling it gave was of a cunning and ruthless monster, reveling in violence. By the end of the work the idea of tribe-like beast came into mind, with characteristics of a lonely hunter.

blocks.text: Overall the design represents the archetype of monkey, gorilla specifically. Fur to weather harsh climate, Elongated thin fingers imply at its proficiency in crafting.

Proportions of the hands and fingers hint at rapid evolution of species that from more physical approach of action branches into homo sapiens way of progression and paranormal, in which mask plays important role, and more concrete route of illusion magic.
